incidents.name: FreshBooks - Investigating My Team Page Issue

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.
We’re currently investigating reports of an issue with the "My Team" page and individual Team Member profiles on FreshBooks. We will post updates as soon as we have them.
We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.

We have fixed the issue impacting FreshBooks, and will continue to monitor it to ensure there’s no further issues. Customers may need to perform a hard refresh on their browser (ctrl/cmd + shift + r) to access their FreshBooks accounts if they encounter an error. Feel free to check back here for any further updates.

We’re currently experiencing an issue which may prevent users from accessing FreshBooks. As a result, you may experience problems with your login while we work to fix the problem. We will post another update as soon as we have more information.
We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks' Bank Connection. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.

We’re currently investigating reports of issues with the Bank Import connection on FreshBooks. Connecting your bank account, refreshing the connection, and expense import can result in an error. 
We will post updates as soon as we have them.
We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.
A fix has been implemented and we will continue to monitor the results.
The issue causing invoice creation and invoice editing has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are continuing to investigate an issue related to invoice creation and editing. Our iOS and Android apps are performing as expected.
We are currently investigating an issue related to invoice creation and invoice editing. Further updates will be provided as we navigate this issue and determine a solution.
The issue affecting Accounting reports and the Chart of Accounts for some users has been resolved, with no further impacts expected. Thanks again for your patience.

We have identified the cause of the Reports issue and have implemented a fix to address the issue. Access to affected Accounting reports and Chart of Accounts has now been restored. Thank you for your patience.
We are currently investigating an issue that is preventing Accounting reports from loading for some users, as well as the Chart of Accounts. Apologies for any inconvenience this may cause.

incidents.name: FreshBooks - Degraded Performance on Billing/Upgrade Page

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.

We have fixed the issue impacting Upgrades on FreshBooks on Android devices using Google Pay. We will continue to monitor it to ensure there’s no further downtime. Feel free to check back here for any further updates.
The FreshBooks Billing/Upgrade Issue is limited to Android users on Google Pay, and are working quickly to fix it. We will post an update as soon as everything is resolved.

There’s currently an issue with degraded performance on our Billing/upgrade page on FreshBooks which can impact the ability to Upgrade/Update Billing info. We are working on fixing the performance issues and getting functionality back for the Billing/upgrade page Please check back for further updates.
We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks' Hubspot, Shopify, and Income Importer Apps. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.

We are currently investigating an issue reported earlier today which affects our Hubspot, Shopify, and Income Importer apps. We are aware of the issue and are currently working toward identifying the causes and solution. Apologies to affected users for any inconvenience this may cause.

incidents.name: Some users unable to save Invoices, Estimates, Expenses

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.
We have rolled back the changes impacting FreshBooks and will continue to monitor it to ensure there’s no further downtime. Feel free to check back here for any further updates.

We are currently investigating an issue reported earlier today which affects some users' ability to save Invoices, Estimates and Expenses. The issue appears to be limited to a small number of users based on reported cases. We are aware of the issue and are currently working toward identifying the causes and solution. Apologies to affected users for any inconvenience this may cause.
We have resolved the issue with PayPal. All functionality is back to normal. Thank you for your patience.

We are currently experiencing an issue with clients being able to pay with PayPal payment methods. The team is aware of the problem and is working to resolve it. You may notice issues with Invoice and checkout link payments through PayPal. We will post another update as soon as we have more information.
We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.
Issues Impacting WePay transactions have been identified and remediated. We will continue to monitor it to ensure there’s no further downtime. Feel free to check back here for any further updates.

We are currently experiencing an issue with WePay. The team is aware of the problem and is working to resolve it, but you may notice issues with processing transactions. We will post another update as soon as we have more information.
This incident has been resolved.
We have resolved the issue with Stripe. All functionality is back to normal and affected transactions have been updated with the correct status.

FreshBooks is currently unable to process failed transactions through Stripe. Some users may find that information about failed direct debit payments is not appearing in their FreshBooks account. The team is aware of the problem and is working to resolve it. We will post another update as soon as we have more information.
We have resolved the issue impacting the Fundbox integration on FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.

A fix has been implemented for the issue impacting the use of the Fundbox integration on FreshBooks. We will continue to monitor it to ensure there’s no further issues with the Fundbox integration. Feel free to check back here for any further updates.

There’s currently an issue with the Fundbox Integration on FreshBooks. Use of the Fundbox integration on FreshBooks will be impacted until Fundbox can resolve the issue on their end. Please check back for further updates.

incidents.name: FreshBooks - Degraded Performance with Automatic Transaction Import

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue impacting Automatic Bank Transaction Import. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue.

We are aware of an issue with our Automatic Bank Transaction Import, which caused a number of transactions to not import into some FreshBooks accounts recently.  We are continuing to investigate and monitor this issue. Please check back here for any updates.

We are aware of an issue with our Automatic Bank Transaction Import, which caused a number of transactions to not import into some FreshBooks accounts recently.  We are continuing to investigate and monitor this issue. Please check back here for any updates.

We are aware of an issue with our Automatic Bank Transaction Import, which caused a number of transactions to not import into some FreshBooks accounts recently.  We are starting to see some of the missing transactions begin to import into the affected accounts but some transactions are still being impacted.  We are continuing to investigate and monitor this issue. Please check back here for any updates.
We have resolved the issue impacting freshbooks.com. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.

There’s currently an issue with freshbooks.com. We’ve identified the problem and are working to fix it, however users may be unable to log in from the main site. Instead, please us my.freshbooks.com to log in and access your account.
We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.

We have identified the source of the issue affecting loading the Invoices section and are seeing behaviour returning to normal across affected accounts. We will continue to monitor the issue and provide any necessary service updates here.

We are currently investigating reports of some users experiencing errors or slowness when loading their Invoices section in FreshBooks. This issue is affecting users sporadically, and may affect loading Dashboard widgets and Reports. We will provide updates as they become available.
We have resolved the issue impacting Apple Single Sign-On (SSO) on FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue.

We have fixed the issue impacting Apple Single Sign-On (SSO) on FreshBooks, and will continue to monitor it to ensure no further impact to our customers.

Feel free to check back here for any further updates.

There’s currently an issue with Apple Single Sign-On (SSO) on FreshBooks. We are currently investigating the issue, however, you may be unable to sign in to your FreshBooks Account using Apple SSO at this time. If possible, please sign in using your FreshBooks email and password instead.

Please check back for further updates.

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.

There’s currently an issue preventing customers from being able to unsubscribe from FreshBooks marketing emails at this time. We are working to resolve this issue so you can successfully unsubscribe from our marketing emails. Please check back for further updates.
We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Please check back for further updates.
All affected transactions have been fixed and the incident has been resolved.

We have fixed the issue impacting the majority of Stripe transactions, and are continuing to work on fixing the remaining affected transactions. 

Please check back here for any updates. We thank you for your patience.
We have identified the issue and are working quickly with Stripe to fix it. We will post an update as soon as everything is resolved.

We are currently experiencing an issue with Stripe transactions. The team is aware of the problem and is working to resolve it, but you may notice issues with refunds. We will post another update as soon as we have more information.
We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.
We have fixed the issue impacting FreshBooks, and will continue to monitor it to ensure there’s no further downtime. Feel free to check back here for any further updates.

There’s currently an issue with accessing or updating your FreshBooks subscription plan. We’ve identified the problem and are working to fix it, however you may be unable to access that area at this time. Please check back for further updates.

incidents.name: Identified Issue with Search and Webhook Delay

incident_updates.body: Monitoring for the search and webhooks issues has concluded and all related issues have now been resolved. Thanks again for your patience.

The issues affecting performance of search functions and webhooks in FreshBooks have now been resolved. We are continuing to monitor but are not expecting any further disruptions. Thank you for your patience.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

There’s currently an issue causing delayed performance with both Search and webhooks on FreshBooks. We’ve identified the problem and are working to fix it.  We will post updates as soon as we have them.
We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.

The issue affecting one of our external partners has been fixed along with the impact to FreshBooks. We will continue to monitor it to ensure there’s no further disruption. Feel free to check back here for any further updates.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Due to problems with an external service, there’s currently an issue with the Billing and Upgrade page on the FreshBooks platform, as well as freshbooks.com. We’ve identified the problem and are working to fix it, however you may be unable to use access the Billing and Upgrade and freshbooks.com pages at this time. Please check back for further updates.

This incident has now been resolved, FreshBooks services are functional again.  We thank you all for your patience and understanding.

We are continuing to monitor the issue that caused FreshBooks to become unavailable and to ensure that our fix has been fully implemented successfully.  Updates will be provided as soon as new details become available.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
FreshBooks is currently down, and our team is working hard to get it back up and running. We will post updates as soon as we have them.

incident_updates.body: The issue impacting PDF generation on FreshBooks is now resolved.
There’s currently an issue generating PDFs of Invoices & Estimates on FreshBooks. We are investigating the issue. Please check back for further updates.

incidents.name: Latency affecting Time Entries, Projects and Profitability Summary report

incident_updates.body: Monitoring of this incident has concluded and no further disruptions are expected. Thanks again for your patience.

A fix has been implemented and we are no longer seeing slowness related to Time Entries and Projects, and functionality of the Profitability Summary report has been restored. We are continuing to monitor the issue but no further complications are expected.

FreshBooks is currently experiencing increased traffic that may result in Time Entries or Projects loading slower than normal. Additionally, users may encounter issues when loading the Profitability Summary report, and may be unable to access the report temporarily. 

We are currently investigating and working to implement a fix that will resolve these issues. Updates will be provided as they become available. Thanks for your patience and apologies for any inconvenience this may cause.

incidents.name: FreshBooks - Errors Registering New Users via Partnership Signup Flow

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue impacting the registration of new users via our partnership signup flow on FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue.
We have fixed the issue impacting partnership signup flow on FreshBooks and will continue to monitor it to ensure there are no further issues. Feel free to check back here for any further updates.
We have identified the issue impacting FreshBooks registration via the Partnership Signup Flow and are working quickly to fix it. We will post an update as soon as everything is resolved.

We’ve identified the problem and are working to fix it, however you may be unable to register for a new FreshBooks account via the partnership flow at this time. Please check back for further updates.
We have resolved the PDF issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue.
PDF errors have now stopped, but we are continuing to monitor the situation for any unexpected behaviour.

PDF errors are still sporadically occurring, but instances are decreasing. All related delays and issues have resolved but we will continue to monitor the situation for any spikes in activity or errors.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We have detected and identified an issue where successful logins were intermittent, and application latency was present for a short period of time. We are monitoring the situation and will provide further updates as soon as they become available.

incidents.name: FreshBooks - Issue with PDF download & Logo's

incident_updates.body: This incident is now resolved.
We have fixed the underlying issues impacting FreshBooks and will continue to monitor that fix. Feel free to check back here for any further updates.
We have identified the root issue impacting FreshBooks and are working to resolve all underlying performance issues.

We are currently experiencing the following issues on FreshBooks:
- intermittent issues with logos
- issue impacting PDF generation
- issue with invoice mail requests dropping PDF attachments but still successfully sending emails to clients without PDFs
- intermittent issue with Time-entry Details report failing to load
We are still working to resolve these issues and will provide more updates as we work to resolve these issues.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

There’s currently an issue impacting; logo's, Time-Entry Details Report, & causing PDF generation to fail on FreshBooks. We are investigating these various issues and are working to fix it. Please check back for further updates.

FreshBooks experienced a service disruption with our platform's webhooks. During this time, webhooks failed to fire. This disruption lasted until approximately 2:18 pm EST same day. The issue which caused this disruption has since been resolved and we do apologize for the inconvenience.
Customer calls are connecting to Support without issue.
We are seeing the system recover and calls are connecting as expected. We will continue to monitor and update as this progresses.
We are currently investigating an issue with our call provider which is resulting in some customer calls not connecting to Support.
We have resolved the issue impacting PDF generation on FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.

The issue affecting access to FreshBooks has been resolved, although generating PDFs within FreshBooks remains disabled. We’ve identified the problem and are working to fix it, however you may be unable to generate PDFs at this time. Please check back for further updates.

We’re currently experiencing an issue which may prevent users from accessing FreshBooks or generating PDFs within their account. As a result, you may experience problems with your login while we work to fix the problem. We will post another update as soon as we have more information.
We have resolved the issue impacting FreshBooks. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue. Check back here for any further updates.
We have fixed the issue impacting FreshBooks, and will continue to monitor it to ensure there’s no further downtime. We thank you and appreciate your patience while we worked to fix this issue.

Our New FreshBooks and Classic FreshBooks platforms are available for use again. We are continuing to investigate and monitoring performance at this time. Further updates will be provided as soon as they are available. Again, we thank you and appreciate your continued patience.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Our New FreshBooks and Classic FreshBooks platforms are currently unavailable. We continue to work towards remediation at this time and updates will be provided as soon as they are available. We thank you for your patience.

We are continuing to investigate reports of latency in our New FreshBooks and Classic FreshBooks platforms.  While our investigation continues, remediation efforts are currently being explored. PDF downloads have been disabled while we research our opportunities to resolve this issue globally.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

We are currently investigating an access issue affecting the FreshBooks platform. Users may be have trouble logging in, loading various pages and/or downloading PDFs. We will post another update shortly. Please subscribe to our status page to receive email updates as we progress. Thank you for your patience.
